experience.title: Senior Front End Engineer
experience.description: Improved user job search experience by implementing new designs, fixing bugs, and adding responsive components to the experience for all devices. Improved user registration across various pages, increased job alerts across the application, and created AB tests to experiment new features. Helped improve front end development by updating internal build tools to use babel 7, adding components to global component library, updating webpack configurations, refactoring resuable code, adding automated testing with jest / enzyme into build tools.

experience.title: Front End Engineer
experience.description: Developed 2 React Applications, 1 for internal tools within the company, and the other a SAAS product. Developed a React library for a collection of shared company components used within all our applications. Architected GraphQL API specifications for service engineers to implement the requirements for all front end data needs. Implemented virtualized and seamless pagination techniques to help users interact with thousands of rows of data. Implemented Authentication via AWS cognito user pools as well as Federated Identities with Google sign in. Created global style rules and specifications for front end engineers to follow, in order to keep a persistent style as the business scaled.

experience.title: Web App Developer
experience.description: Developed full stack applications with Laravel, PHP, and Vue.js to create web applications for non-profit organizations and insurance companies. Created complex tools such as multi-tiered event creations for large administrations. Integrated Stripe 1 time payment and subscription solutions into applications. Configured and managed virtual linux servers via Digital Ocean. Provided “On-Call” support for emergency critical situations.

experience.title: Director of Traffic and Sales
experience.description: Developed full stack applications with Wordpress, PHP, and Javascript to create marketing business applications. Created custom webinar funnels integrated with external tracking, shopping cart, and marketing software. Responsible for Facebook advertising, email marketing campaigns, a book campaign, mastermind marketing, business summit planning and all other online revenue streams. Led a small team of technical support for Angular based web app (FitPro Newsletter). Implemented a custom Kanban web app software with Meteor, to improve communications between technical support team and remote developers.
